body.p:
Louisville May 13 1864
To His Excelleny Thos E Bramlette
Gov of Ky
Dear Sir

Allow me to introduce recommend Mr. J H Metcalf for the office of Notary Public It will be a great convienence to persons doing business with his Brother L S Metcalf AQM.. And I take great pleasure in saying that he is well qualified for said office and that his appointment is necessary and important
